Description:
Summary:The Design and Estimation Engineer is responsible for the design, estimation, and pre-sales of fire protection systems. This includes working with customers to understand their needs, developing and documenting fire protection designs, preparing cost estimates, and supporting the sales team. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of fire protection codes and standards, as well as experience with fire protection design software.Responsibilities:Work with customers to understand their fire protection needs
Develop and document fire protection designs
Prepare cost estimates
Support the sales team
Stay up-to-date on fire protection codes and standards
Conduct research on new fire protection technologiesSkills
Skills:
Bachelor's degree in fire protection engineering or a related field
5+ years of experience in fire protection design and estimation
Strong understanding of fire protection codes and standards
Experience with fire protection design software
Excellent written and verbal communication skills
Ability to work independently and as part of a team
